title: Over 15 Malicious npm Packages Exploiting Windows to Deploy Vidar Malware

content.raw: Datadog Security Research has uncovered a sophisticated supply chain attack targeting the npm ecosystem, involving 17 malicious packages across 23 releases designed to deliver the Vidar infostealer malware to Windows systems. The campaign, attributed to a threat actor cluster tracked as MUT-4831, represents a significant escalation in npm-based threats and marks the first known public […] The post Over 15 Malicious npm Packages Exploiting Windows to Deploy Vidar Malware appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
